titleStmt.title: The historie of the tvvo valiant knights, Syr Clyomon Knight of the Golden Sheeld, sonne to the King of Denmarke: and Clamydes the white Knight, sonne to the King of Suauia As it hath bene sundry times acted by her Maiesties Players.
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: The historie of Clyomon Knight of the golden Sheeld.
Identified as STC 19538 on UMI microfilm reel 348.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 348 ł and reel 1022 #5 (same copy filmed twice).
